name: market for gluing mill | gluing mill | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23714/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This dataset represents the market for medium sized gluing plants for the production of glued timber products, such as glue laminated timber, cross laminated timber, glued solid timber and similar products.;The modelled plant is located adjacent to the sawmill in which the timber is sawn before gluing.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Medium sized gluing mill, located with sawmill
